alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 1:16PM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected. Visibility lowering to under a mile at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph at times. * WHERE...The Interstate 80 Summit and eastern foothills. * WHEN...Through 11 PM tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
